item.description: President Trump was asked on Wednesday about Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell amid reports that Trump had indicated to allies he would fire him.

item.title: Mom, 2 girls found living inside remote cave in snake-infested forest
item.description: The woman, identified as Nina Kutina, 40, and her daughters, aged six and four, were found by police during a routine patrol .

item.title: Jane's Addiction bandmates sue each other over onstage fight that ended tour
item.description: The members of alternative rock band Jane’s Addiction have filed dueling lawsuits after an onstage scuffle last year prompted the cancellation of the ...

item.title: 1.4M of the nation’s poorest renters risk losing their homes with Trump’s proposed HUD time limit
item.description: A Trump administration proposal could put more than a million low-income households at risk of losing their government-subsidized housing.

item.title: Italy's leader says Israeli raid hit Catholic Church in Gaza city
item.description: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said "Israeli raids" hit the only Catholic Church in Gaza, and she condemned attacks on civilians as "unacceptab...

item.title: WATCH: Mysterious Pride flag-wearing robot spotted in Hollywood
item.description: Some California motorists were shocked to see a cowboy hat-wearing robot draped in Pride flags running through West Hollywood.

item.title: Bear roaming golf course halts play at tournament again
item.description: The bear was spotted near the first tee at the Meiji Yasuda Ladies tournament at Sendai Classic Golf Club in northern Japan.

item.title: WATCH: Stealthy squirrel steals chicken snack from stroller at EPCOT
item.description: "Good for you, bud," one impressed onlooker could be heard saying as the crafty critter made its getaway.

1 dead, 14 hurt after lightning strike at New Jersey archery range
item.description: One person was killed and 14 others were injured after being struck by lightning in Jackson Township, New Jersey on Wednesday.

item.title: More than 120 Ukraine drones enter Russia with Moscow targeted, Defense Ministry says
